Name: Medieval Mayhem
About the game: Build your castle and destroy those of your ennemies in this online destruction game. Defeat your ennemies and steal their gold to make it to the top, allowing you to build bigger and bigger! Medieval Mayhem let you build your castle brick by brick, to make your gold chests safe. You can then attack other player's castles and detroy them with a huge ballista equiped with boulders and bombs. You start the game with some gold, but to build the castle of your dreams you will need more! Defeat your ennemies every day to be sure to earn all the gold you'll ever need and become the king of Medieval Mayhem.
